column5: Lol!! I love it!

21 replies to a non report report...  WOW  Most "normal" reports don't get that much support from members....  Kinda funny  that says something about Mike and his story telling talent .... I am also eagerly awaiting ...
Which weekend lol
sounds like an epic trip, I'm sure the report will be worth the wait
Whats that old saying?........ This thread is useless without pichers cant wait........
Come on Mike, we want a full report, complete with pix as always!  OK, I'll wait.  Do I have a choice?
Still waiting........

Just a teaser guys, at the moment I'm bursting to talk about this trip LOL! In a nutshell I just had the best fishing trip of my life, no lie. I was at North Caribou Lake in far northwestern ON with my family last week and words literally cannot describe the experience. The lake is vast, 81,000 acres and teems with fish. I set the camp record for most pike over 40" caught by one angler in a week.  Walleye fishing believe it or not was even better.  Detailed report will be started today.
Fish tease.
I'll donate all my bandwith for the pictures alone. Can't wait!
Can not wait Mike Getter done.
Waiting patiently  .
AHHHHHHH A Borger report.....what could be better? Glad you had a great trip, Mike.
awesome stuff Mike - can't wait to see the report!
bring it on! let's see some fish...
Cool deal now show us the money.   Art
Sure keep us waiting !!!! Lol
tick tock tick tock
Northwest Ontario........ where my heart is.
OOOHH this is gonna be good!  Hurry up and give us the skimpy dude!!
lets see the report!!

Reading correctly here... the "North Caribou" with "the family."  Rumored to be one heckuva NW ON destination with little overall pressure.  That's a trip!  Business must be goooood Mr. Borger.   Should make for an interesting read.
I don't wannna rush ya Mike, but I've had my clothes off for a long time waiting for this one.
that's just wrong     cause that's something  would say  lol
That's how NOT to get invited to a remote cabin! Lol  Let's go Mike, you never disappoint with your reports.

That's how NOT to get invited to a remote cabin! Lol..  The first guy slept with Mick and comes to breakfast the next morning with his hair a mess and his eyes all bloodshot.  They said, "Man, what happened to you? He said, "Mick snored so loudly, I just sat up and watched him all night."  The next night it was a different guy's turn. In the morning, same thing, hair all standing up, eyes all bloodshot.  They said, "Man, what happened to you? You look awful! He said, 'Man, that Mick shakes the roof with his snoring. I watched him all night."  The third night was Bill's turn. He was a tanned, older and a man's man.. The next morning he came to breakfast bright-eyed and bushy-tailed.  "Good morning!" he said. They couldn't believe it.. They said, "Man, what happened?" He said, "Well, we got ready for bed. I went and tucked Mick into bed, patted him on the arse, and kissed him good night on the lips. Mick sat up and watched me all night."  With age comes wisdom.

Should have something up by the weekend guys. I have 41/2 hours of video to sift through and edit and hundreds of photos. Plus I have an actual job that takes up 40 hours of my time.  Just spoke to the camp owner and plans are already in the works for a return trip next year, and there's very few places that would compel me to do that.
WEEKEND?!?!?!?  I've been clicking 'refresh' all morning ....... now I have to wait for the weekend.  That's ridiculous.
21 replies to a non report report...  WOW  Most "normal" reports don't get that much support from members....  Kinda funny

Should have something up by the weekend guys. I have 41/2 hours of video to sift through and edit and hundreds of photos. Plus I have an actual job that takes up 40 hours of my time.  Just spoke to the camp owner and plans are already in the works for a return trip next year, and there's very few places that would compel me to do that.  Mike, your reports are worth waiting for. I'm as patient as possible for them. Take your time, you're a busy dude...don't be rushed. When I see that you have a report up, I'll make a pot of coffee and read it several times over. Thanks for the pleasure of posting it here.

Bahahaha!   That's Awesome!  I'm normally the bloodshot eye guy at camp...  not next year! Sppeaking of which, here's a joke to amuse you while you wait with bated---or as some fishermen say 'baited'---breath for the report Sleeping with Mick
